name: Coin-Ops
description:
Remotely control a robot who must race to collect treasure from mysterious caves before rival treasure hunters clean them out first. Your robot can jump, shoot and collect magic gems that will help protect it on the journey.

  • Use the control stick or arrow keys to move
  • Use the jump Button or spacebar to Jump
  • Tap the screen to shoot at rival explorers
  • Collect all the coins to progress
  • Collect blue gems to become invincible for a short time
  • Scan the room for items and obstacles before beginning to explore.
  • There are infinite lives, but the level resets if you die and you cannot progress without collecting ALL of the coins.
  • The in-game user interface will include the coin counter and the mobile controls for the game

Mobile SG Programming II (2022SP.SGD.268.0003)

Warren McClain
